text: Today on the West Coast, Ardnave Bay and Saligo Bay are lighting up with clean 3ft @9s WNW swell and light E winds at 11 mph. Best windows are from 08:56 to 15:55 for Ardnave and 08:56 to 15:35 for Saligo. Tomorrow, conditions drop to 2ft @8s NW with fresh 17 mph E winds, making it less inviting. The day after brings a slight recovery to 2ft @8s WNW, still with light E winds. Best: today.
